content: of any ch3 space *bpsc around next 4 st ch1 in front of round 5 round 3 popcorn in space between 2 2dccl from round 2 directly popcorn in skip ch1 space from round 4 before the popcorn ch2 skip popcorn popcorn in below ch1 skip ch1 space behind bpsc around next double_crochet* ch1 space after the popcorn ch1 skip chain 3 space behind bpsc around repeat from * to * around omitting the last bpsc close next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around omitting the last bpsc with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 6 popcorn 30 bpsc close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 12 popcorn 30 bpsc 12 ch1 space 6 ch2 space 12 ch1 space - round 4 placement popcorn - round 6 placement popcorn - round 4 finished - round 6 finished round 5 skip all popcorn and ch1 sps round 7 skip all popcorn and ch2 sps with new color stand double_crochet in first bpsc following any popcorn with new color stand double_crochet in ch1 space following any 2nd popcorn *double_crochet in next 4 st ch3 double_crochet in next bpsc* repeat from *double_crochet in next st first bpsc 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st * to * around omitting the last double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in twice double_crochet in next ch1 space before next popcorn ch2 double_crochet in ch1 space first st and cut yarn 30 double_crochet 6 ch3 space after 2nd popcorn * repeat from * to * around omitting the last double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 54 double_crochet 6 ch2 space - round 5 finished - round 7 finished ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus september 2023 it s not allowed to sell or publish this pattern or parts of it no uploading on social media copyright is mine round 8 with new color stand bpsc around first double_crochet round 11 with new color stand bpsc around first double_crochet of a following any ch2 space *bpsc around next 8 st ch1 5-double_crochet-group following any ch1 space *bpsc around next 4 st in front of round 7 popcorn in skip ch2 space from round 6 directly in front of round 10 sppuff in space between the 2 2dccl from below ch1 skip ch2 space behind bpsc around next double_crochet* round 9 directly below skip ch1 space behind sppuff bpsc around repeat from * to * around omitting the last bpsc close next 5 st twice in front of round 10 sppuff in ch1 space from with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 6 popcorn 54 bpsc round 9 skip ch1 space behind sppuff bpsc around next double_crochet* repeat 12 ch1 space from * to * around omitting the last bpsc close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 18 sppuff 90 bpsc - round 8 finished - round 11 finished round 9 skip all popcorn and ch1 sps with new color stand 2dccl in
